description: The Social Development Canada department requires the services of a Contractor to gather and organize information from relevant target audiences...
full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Business Requirement Identification and User Engagement on an Integrated Federal-Provincial/Territorial Student Financial Assistance Estimator

The Government of Canada, through the Department of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC), invites submissions for the provision of business requirement identification and user engagement services to inform the development, implementation, and ongoing maintenance of an integrated Federal-Provincial-Territorial Student financial Assistance estimator.

#### Project Overview

The Government of Canada aims to develop a robust and integrated estimator to streamline the student financial assistance application process. To achieve this goal, ESDC requires a contractor to gather and organize information from relevant target audiences, the Canadian Student Financial Assistance program, and provinces/territories. The successful contractor will be responsible for developing a comprehensive report containing recommendations and next steps for the development of the estimator.

#### Key Requirements

* Identify business requirements for the development, implementation, and maintenance of an integrated Federal-Provincial-Territorial Student financial Assistance estimator
* Engage with relevant target audiences, the Canadian Student Financial Assistance program, and provinces/territories to gather information and insights
* Develop a comprehensive report containing recommendations and next steps for the development of the estimator
* Collaborate with ESDC stakeholders to ensure alignment with government objectives and requirements

#### Submission Requirements

* Submissions must be in English or French, the official languages of Canada
* A proposal outlining the contractor's approach, methodology, and timelines must be included
* A detailed budget and pricing structure for the project must be submitted
* The following documentation is available for download:
	+ English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20595/100023868-npp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20595/100023868-npp_en.pdf)
	+ French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20595/100023868-apm_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20595/100023868-apm_fr.pdf)

#### Contact Information

For further information or to submit a proposal, please contact:
Joshua De Sousa
Phone: (343) 543-8997
Email: [joshua.desousa@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:joshua.desousa@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
